documents.document: It's the last day of the holidays so I am being technologically relaxed. This means we are on our 85th episode of Pokemon.
Why blue sky now aye Welly? I'm sorry, you're too late. I'm going to bed to watch the good wife. #pfft
Right. So I've just put a pair of socks and another cardie on because that's what we do in Wellington this summer.
Cheerio sausages and sauce for lunch. One and a half days to go till kids go back to school. The countdown is on.
Still no word from Bill English or statement about POTUS #MuslimBan from NZ govt? Shameful.
"Look for the helpers. You will always find people who are helping.â€ - what Fred Rogers mammy said. https://t.co/rd8kRYao5w
@SleepyVole Good point. I bet he'd love that snap shot too.
And Teresa May. What is that? Women around the world MARCHED and she holds his hand?
Trump really challenges politicians. Personal ambition or people? It's usually such a delicate balance. Until it's not.
Cats and dogs ðŸ’¦â˜”ï¸ðŸŒ§.
There's a movie coming out called 'Hidden Figures' but thanks to @MarianKeyes I read it as 'Hidden Figurines' - a tale of nervous nicknacksðŸ˜‚
One eye on the stone skimmers ðŸ˜ŽðŸ“š https://t.co/iBH844RL1X
Summer in wet windy Welly - visited the library for more books, pies and sausage rolls for lunch, and pink iced buns too!
@CafeWeka https://t.co/BJOfQkm90U each 1 takes 3mins to cook. Empty dishwasher & clean, then get waffle reward & feel virtuous & organised!
I've had a waffle basket (that machine is the best thing ever) and maple syrup. And I ate peaches from the tin while my waffle cooked.
Oh isn't Meryl Streep just the bees knees? She is so fabulous. I want a poster of her on my wall. And one on my daughters wall.
Farmers club rewards are basically just stuff that you get anyway if you wait for their weekly sales.
I know it's probably been covered before, but how shit are those new farmers club rewards?
Each day I write is like stepping into the unknown. Perhaps that's why writing is so addictive? The high of a day... https://t.co/Dn0CX331fC
Put the Three Amigo's on netflix for kids. Miss12: "This movie was made in 1986." Mstr9: "This movie is ancient. It was made 30 yrs ago."
Sometimes it's good to shuffle out of your comfort zone, just a wee bit! https://t.co/sShVOKApug
4 of 5 stars to Night School by Lee Child https://t.co/dgXyONVJcE
Husband came to ask my dinner plans. Me: I'm afraid Jack Reacher is about to find the thing he's been looking for. I better get back to it.
To all my lovely readers, for all your encouragement, for sharing your time and energy with me, and for reading... https://t.co/YrwwP21uBp
Finishing up 2016, lying in bed with Belles reading. https://t.co/IQ4APiIUPR
Kids: "but their dad is the goalie!" Me: "their mother must be a VERY patient woman!!!"
YouTube clip - kids have dragged bed mattresses to backyard, bouncing to score goals. Me: "their mother must be a very patient woman."
At lots of crackers and cheese. Now everyone else is hungry and I'm like, meh.
Waiting for my turn, if someone steals my A I'm gonna be dark. https://t.co/F1BI0jDBwY
@refugeaunties cheeky doggie just wanted to get a jump on Christmas morning!
@QueenofMidsomer lots of love to you all, have a fabulous day! (17 minutes to go) ðŸ˜‚ðŸŽ…ðŸ»ðŸŽ„
Listening to the kids lying in bed trying to get to 6am before they can wake us up to do presents ðŸ™ŠðŸŽ„ðŸŽ…ðŸ»
@refugeaunties you too my wonderful inspiring woman! ðŸŽ„ðŸ’›
Don't cry, shop girl ðŸ˜Š #youvegotmail
You've got mail. Yes! Those are very powerful words. Yes. #youvegotmail
Don't they know you're supposed to have a last name? #youvegotmail
It's not personal, it's business #youvegotmail
Meanwhile I'm putting up more twinkle lights #youvegotmail the answer to many woes - more twinkle lights ðŸ’¡ðŸ’¡ðŸ’¡
Kathleen Kelly started my love affair with cardigans #youvegotmail
Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. â¤ï¸
Cheap books and legal addictive stimulants #youvegotmail
My Christmas Eve movie choice is my forever favourite, you've got mail!
This cracked me up - cause it's true! - thanks @kiwiclover ðŸ˜‚â¤ï¸ https://t.co/N661D0subY
Groceries away, hot dogs have been inhaled for lunch. I vote nap time now!
@GrowFromHereNZ mitre10 is joy for him, slippery polished concrete floors to slide on, he nearly took out stack of paper towels yesterday!ðŸ™ˆðŸ˜‚
@GrowFromHereNZ my eldest is supermarket dream. Youngest at age 9, is still a nightmare. Uses aisles as racing track & cricket bowling strip
... and that's just me!
SUPERMARKET day. Who's coming with me & the kids? Can we get gum? Can we get lollies? Can we get a chocolate bar? I'm bored, My legs hurt..
BEST CHRISTMAS SONG EVER. Catchy and Kiwi and funny and fantastic!
But I could only ever remember the chorus - 'Down under, Santa gets a sun tan....' Now I have it all! https://t.co/eTruPiNaK2
Every Christmas ever since I first heard it I have sung the chorus. My kids and I sing it in the car all the time! https://t.co/eTruPiNaK2
This song! I must have heard it on @radionz at least 2 decades ago (ahem, maybe wee bit more) https://t.co/eTruPiNaK2
@AliIkram and the upside down plastic bottles half filled with water in the background of those pictures. flipping bottle flipping!
Husband put clothes away. ðŸ™ˆ https://t.co/WsZI7au5sj
Late baking Christmas cake is filling the house with delicious smells. I hate eating the stuff, it's for my sis, but I love the Xmas scent!
I'm fecking pissed off about English getting rid of Minister for Broadcasting.
Home from another pre-Christmas Christmas. The Chelsea Winter plum cheesecake was, as always, delicious, & I accepted all praise. #falala
@QueenofMidsomer or if I say neither, that's not popular.
He's really challenging my listening skills. And my decision making skills. And my early morning communication skills.
9 year olds favourite conversations at the moment begin with "would you rather." And require me to answer with words, not just 'mmmm'
Now I get excited when I don't wake up & spend 2 hours in the middle of the night contemplating my existence & looking at the Pinterest.
Remember when the excitement was all about staying awake ALL NIGHT! (No - me neither) ðŸ˜œ
Sunday morning - snoring 9 yr old beside me after dream of something with three eyes. Don't care how early it is because I slept all night!
@philiplyth bloom and grow for eeeeverrrrrr
Also, if you're in the Saturday morning kids cricket fraternity - you may like reading this! https://t.co/mZ1YgSgw51
Cricket gear has finished its cycle. The kids will be white & bright in the morning. Maybe a tad damp but the Welly breeze will fix that!
Miss 12 has been in the shower for 22 minutes. I can guarantee she hasn't washed her hair yet.
Water balloons have run out. Kids have offered to wash my car. I'm enjoying this afternoon https://t.co/nH9lkQcfQs
I'm listening to @JMulliganRNZ while kids have water balloon fights. #kiwias https://t.co/5RVB3gDdn8
Great balls of fire â€“ throwing down some cricket advice for unsuspectingÂ parents. https://t.co/MBzo6OpxwI https://t.co/Cscuity4fM
"You are like no other... because you are my brother!" #GilmoreGirlsRevival #StarsHollow ðŸ™ˆðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
Miss 12 got chosen to be a young leader at her intermediate next year. #proudmama #girlpower
The lad chose to eat a marmite sandwich over chicken and rice. And am I bovered? NOPE!
Tonight's meal consisted of prepackaged everything- chicken, rice, falafel... all from packets. Am I bovered? nope! #tiredcook
Ohhh the books I plan on reading these holidays! All the books, I will read them!!
Let the last days of school begin! The lad finishes today, the tween tomorrow.. then we are LUNCH BOX FREE for 6 whole wonderful weeks!
I have finally ordered my spatone iron. Fell off the wagon a while ago. Too long ago. #selfcare
What a crazy day in Kiwi land. I've always wondered what would happen when Key left. We're about to find out!
I didn't realise they'd stopped making White Collar! Just finished Season 6 on Netflix & didn't realise it was the END end. I ðŸ’› Mozzie.
Not a fan of touch rugby when forecast is showers & southerly. Better put some warm socks & a thermal on. #wellysummer
Love Critter of the Week with @JMulliganRNZ and @DOCTSAmbassador Nicola Toki. I was waiting for the 'fun guy' and she didn't let me down!
Tired. Almost put a scoop of clothes washing powder in the cats bowl.ðŸ™€
I'm signing books! They'll be in the post tomorrow ðŸ˜Šâ­ï¸ðŸŽ„ðŸŽ…ðŸ»ðŸ’‹ https://t.co/JoKSZlk7TI
"Manuscripts come from all around New Zealand, and one of the past winners, Rochelle Elliot, is now a published... https://t.co/TnrTfOdiKh
And grateful for the wind for making my washing dry too!
Also, grateful to have hubby back home from Kaikoura, and for a lovely hour sitting on the front step in the sunshine with him this morning.
In other, not really news, news - windy windy Wellington. grumble grumble. But better thank shaky shaky. So grateful grateful.
And then we got some of the little flowers to stick in the garden to help the bees!
Then we went to mitre 10 and chose some seedlings, lettuce and broccolli and bok choy and parsley.
Then I pulled out the old dead snap pea plant from the vege garden and put more compost in.
Hubby helped me hang the trellis for the clematis today. I successfully rescued it from the grip of a stupid weed type vine.
Morning ball. https://t.co/dBsKsYYC0s
My online shopping skills are exemplary this year. I'm so organised it's scary! ðŸŽ„ðŸŽ…ðŸ»
When Dad gets back from a week in Kaikoura with USAR. ðŸ’› https://t.co/J8NCSXy89k
I love it when the kids take a break from minecraft videos to watch 'people are awesome' videos. People really are totally awesome! ðŸ’ªðŸ½ðŸ˜Ž
I made a zucchini bacon and cheese loaf. It is good.
I need to instigate a rule where by I do not read articles about the orange buffoon before I try and go to sleep.
If you would prefer a PRINT copy of LEFTOVERS, please be aware of the restrictions in small order self... https://t.co/UU80fSatnq

Lovely readers!
A little lightness after a wobbly night in Welly...
